Package com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.strategy

Class BenevolentPlayerStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.strategy.Strategy
com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.strategy.BenevolentPlayerStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BenevolentPlayerStrategy extends Strategy implements Serializable
Class that implements the Benevolent Player Strategy This class extends the parent Strategy class which has createOrder method to be implemented here.
